sense.gloss: personnel affairs, human affairs, human resources, HR

sdata.j: イギリス↑人↑↓|じん↓↑女性↑↓じ|ょせい↓の52%はセックスよりもチョコレートの↑方↑↓ほう↓が↑好↑↓す↓きだ。
sdata.e: Fifty-two per cent of British women prefer chocolate to sex.

sdata.e: You've got no alibi for the day of the murder.

sdata.e: You should visit Kyoto, which is famous for its old temples and shrines.
